data_table.description: The dataset provides results of questions from the "Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale", rs-marker information obtained for the chosen SNP locations (n=8), and basic socio-demographic data.

variable.name: Subject_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID

variable.name: sex
variable.description: Gender of participant

variable.name: age
variable.description: Subject age

variable.name: HADSaOssz
variable.description: HADS (Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale) anxiety subscale SUM

variable.name: HADSdOssz
variable.description: HADS (Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale) depression subscale SUM

variable.name: HADSaAtl
variable.description: HADS (Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale) anxiety subscale MEAN

variable.name: HADSdAtl
variable.description: HADS (Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale) depression subscale MEAN

variable.name: HADSaN
variable.description: Number of answered items of the HADS (Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale) anxiety subscale

variable.name: HADSdN
variable.description: Number of answered items of the HADS (Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale) depression subscale

variable.name: HADS01aF
variable.description: HADS (Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale) scale item01 - already reversed
